verses.verse: Then Jonah <WH3124> prayed <WH6419> to the LORD <WH3068> his God <WH430> out of the fish's <WH1710> belly, <WH4578>

And said, <WH559> I cried <WH7121> by reason of my affliction <WH6869> to the LORD, <WH3068> and he heard <WH6030> me; out of the belly <WH990> of hell <WH7585> cried <WH7768> I, and you heard <WH8085> my voice. <WH6963>

For you had cast <WH7993> me into the deep, <WH4688> in the middle <WH3824> of the seas; <WH3220> and the floods <WH5104> compassed <WH5437> me about: all <WH3605> your billows <WH4867> and your waves <WH1530> passed <WH5674> over <WH5674> me.
Then I said, <WH559> I am cast <WH1644> out of your sight; <WH5869> yet <WH389> I will look <WH5027> again <WH3254> toward <WH413> your holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
The waters <WH4325> compassed <WH661> me about, even to the soul: <WH5315> the depth <WH8415> closed <WH5437> me round <WH5437> about, the weeds <WH5488> were wrapped <WH2280> about my head. <WH7218>

I went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the bottoms <WH7095> of the mountains; <WH2022> the earth <WH776> with her bars <WH1280> was about <WH1157> me for ever: <WH5769> yet have you brought <WH5927> up my life <WH2416> from corruption, <WH7845> O LORD <WH3068> my God. <WH430>
When my soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> within <WH5921> me I remembered <WH2142> the LORD: <WH3068> and my prayer <WH8605> came <WH935> in to you, into <WH413> your holy <WH6944> temple. <WH1964>
They that observe <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892> forsake <WH5800> their own mercy. <WH2617>
But I will sacrifice <WH2076> to you with the voice <WH6963> of thanksgiving; <WH8426> I will pay <WH7999> that that I have vowed. <WH5087> Salvation <WH3444> is of the LORD. <WH3068>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to the fish, <WH1709> and it vomited <WH6958> out Jonah <WH3124> on the dry <WH3004> land. <WH3004>
